EmailTemplate.name: ACT Solution Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification of Solution #{!Solution.SolutionNumber} Rejection
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Solution.CreatedBy},
This notice is to inform that Solution #{!Solution.SolutionNumber} has been rejected by {!Solution.Rejected_By__c}, because it either does not meet the standards or the information is incomplete.
Please check the Reason field in this Solution for notes from the Reviewer.
A Solution in Rejected status should be modified by the Creator, ensuring the solution meets standards and is complete. The status should then be set for Content Review and Approval by your Team Lead / Manager.
Click on the below link to view details: {!Solution.Link}
Thank you, we appreciate your support!
